Description:
GitHub Copilot coding agent meets you where you're at, allowing you to assign tasks from basically anywhere - including a Slack message. You can even create custom agents focused on specific types of tasks. And the new agent page gives you a central location from which to monitor and steer any coding agent tasks. Meanwhile, Copilot CLI allows you to run autonomous agents locally. Let's explore the new functionality!

Learn more about Copilot agents: https://gh.io/copilot
